title: Argument Specification Schema

$schema.description: The schema followed by the JSON file

description.description: A brief description of the program

licence.description: The license text of the program. SIMPLY NAMING THE LICENSE IS NOT ENOUGH HERE

version.description: The current version of the program

date.description: The date when the program was most recently changed

seeAlso.description: A list of references the reader of a man page may find useful

bugs.description: A list of known bugs and how to report them

about.description: Miscellaneous information about the program or author

type.description: The type of the value or 'help' to output a help message and exit

default.description: If left unspecified, the value taken by the argument

choices.description: A set of values which may be taken by the argument. If omitted, values are unbounded

mandatory.description: Indicates whether a omitting this argument would invalidate a call to the program

help.description: A short description of the argument

args.description: List of the arguments accepted by the program

description: A schema for generating argument-parsers and documentation for arbitrary programs
